memberdef.name: NDCodecCodecStatusString
memberdef.initializer: "CODEC_STATUS" /* (int r/o) Compression status: success or failure */

memberdef.name: NDCodecCodecErrorString
memberdef.initializer: "CODEC_ERROR" /* (string r/o) Error message if compression fails */

memberdef.name: NDCodecBloscCompressorString
memberdef.initializer: "BLOSC_COMPRESSOR" /* (NDCodecBloscComp_t r/w) Which Blosc compressor to use */

memberdef.name: NDCodecBloscNumThreadsString
memberdef.initializer: "BLOSC_NUMTHREADS" /* (int r/w) Number of threads to be used by Blosc */

briefdescription.para: Compress/decompress NDArrays according to available codecs.

detaileddescription.para:
This plugin is a source of NDArray callbacks, passing the (possibly compressed/decompressed) NDArray data to clients that register for callbacks. The plugin currently supports the following codecs (if available at compile time):
JPEG
Blosc

memberdef.argsstring: (NDArray *input, int clevel, int shuffle, NDCodecBloscComp_t compressor, int numThreads, NDCodecStatus_t *status, char *errorMessage)
memberdef.name: compressBlosc
